org.dapper.codelet

Interface Codelet

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EmbeddingCodelet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Broadcast, Cleanup, Create, CreateSortFile, Debug, Download, Dummy, Error, FanSubflow, ForkBomb, Merge, Sort, Split, Upload

    public interface Codelet
    Defines a basic unit of work in Dapper.

        parameters - the parameters.
        Throws:
